Martin Nguyen Martin Nguyen is Associate Professor of Religious Studies, Director of Islamic World Studies, and Faculty Chair for Inclusive Excellence at Fairfield University. His areas of research include the Qur’an and its exegesis, theology, Sufism, and Islamic history. He is the author of Sufi Master and Qur’an Scholar:Abū’l-Qāsim al-Qushayrī and the Laṭāʾif al-Ishārāt
